Description: Ostracon, fragment of the rim-section of a pale red-brown pottery jar with straight sides, the fabric is relatively coarse and grey-black in section, the outer surface is covered with a red-brown slip and there are remains of two lines of incised Coptic text on the exterior.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394311) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394311)
